message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is too low. Could you do $13,000?
I understand that you're willing to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
